name: Add a new row into a Google Sheets spreadsheet from an incoming Mitto SMS
description:
Every time a new Mitto SMS is received, a new row with SMS details will be added to a Google Sheets spreadsheet. 

The sample spreadsheet is [here.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1aEoxwVF4zIN3760iF_MVWUHOJFx62Ubycf3lFti2bRs/edit#gid=0) You should make a copy of it before configuring the template.
